assessment_item.subject: Physics
assessment_item.title: BV85CC-Q8-Two identical sonometer wires have a fundamental frequency of 100 Hz when kept under same tension. What fractional increase in the tension (in percentage) of one wire would cause an occurrence of 1 beat per second when both wires vibrate together?.
assessment_item.body:
